title.zh: 线上：腾讯公益项目执行中期报告发布
title.en: Online: Tencent Charity Project Implementation Interim Report Released

subtitle.zh: 携带者检测费用援助项目中期总结
subtitle.en: Carrier Testing Cost Assistance Project Interim Summary

description.zh: 南昌市血之友公益协会发布腾讯公益「久久公益节」项目《携带者检测费用援助项目》执行中期报告。报告详细总结了项目启动以来的执行情况、服务对象、资金使用、社会影响等各个方面，展示了项目在推动血友病女性关爱方面取得的阶段性成果，为后续工作的深入开展提供了重要参考。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association released the interim implementation report of the Tencent Charity '99 Giving Day' project 'Carrier Testing Cost Assistance Project'. The report comprehensively summarizes the project's implementation since launch, including service recipients, fund utilization, social impact, and other aspects, showcasing the phased achievements in promoting hemophilia women's care and providing important references for future in-depth work.

title.zh: 微信公众号：项目中期报告
